thread.title: Lady Gaga's fashion is not easy to get right
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga's fashion is not easy to get right - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Lady Gaga's fashion is not easy to get right
text:
Singer Lady Gaga, known for donning bizzare ensembles, says wearing her daring outfits isn't "easy" to get right.
READ: â€‹Billboard names Lady Gaga woman of the year
"What people don't always really know about me. (They think) I'm always putting things on to be provocative or shocking for the sake of it. But actually, it's not that easy to wear all of those things and to do it with poise and precision and to hit your mark every time," Gaga told eonline.com.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
The 'Poker face' crooner is grateful that she's not had to compromise her style which she considers her "art" to be in the show.
For more interesting Music news and pictures follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
For latest Music updates follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
"My manager, Bobby Campbell, just said to me, 'You're like a contortionist. You just stand there for hours in pain in those outfits and you have no clue when you're on stage and you get off and it just all hits you'. And he's right. That's exactly what happens. It's what I do. That's my art."
Listen to Lady Gaga on Gaana.com
"So ( American Horror Story ) is actually really stretching me in a great way. It's like I have to take the things that I'm good at and make them even better, and keep them the same every time but still loose so that Ryan (Murphy, executive producer) gets something really truly organic from me," she said.
WATCH: Lady Gaga - Til It Happens To You
